page.name: Introduction
page.keywords: anatomy physiology beat beats conception organ embryo heart bpm

transcript.p: The human heart... priceless. It begins to beat around the 22nd day after conception and is the first organ to form in the developing embryo. As an adult, the heart beats an average of:

This unbelievable organ will beat without stopping, each and every day of your life without a break or a day off,
3 billion times during an average life span of 80 years.
